short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced statistical analysis and Artificial Intelligence to help you maximize your FPL points this season.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Fantasy Genius! We leverage advanced statistical analysis and Artificial Intelligence to help you maximize your FPL points this season. No need to select, click, or do anything. You will be able to see our recommendations straight from your team and transfers pages. We are constantly updating our models to ensure that we take into account all the recent data, injuries, and pundit updates to give you the secret weapon you need to win your mini league. This extension currently only targets the official English Premier league (EPL) fantasy game located at: fantasy.premierleague.com
